fr.unilim.javance.projet.authentication
Class GoogleAccountHandler

java.lang.Object
  fr.unilim.javance.projet.authentication.GoogleAccountHandler

public class GoogleAccountHandler
extends java.lang.Object

A class used to manage a Google account This class is instantiated when an account is needed by the application. It's responsible off all the management of the account (getting tokens and creating it).

Author:
Thibault Desmoulins, Yorick Lesecque
See Also:
AccountManager, RemoteManager, AccountManagerCallback

          A private class implementing AccountManagerCallback This class is used as a callback for the getAuthToken function.

Method Detail

setRemoteManager

public void setRemoteManager(RemoteManager rManager)
Function used to use the RemoteManager as an observer of this class. This observer is used to simplify callbacks operations when a thread is running.

Parameters:
rManager - The RemoteManager used as observer

haveAccount

private boolean haveAccount()
Function used to look if a "com.google" account exists.

Returns:
Returns true if an account already exists false otherwise

addAccount

private void addAccount()
Function used to create a "com.google" account. This function is called at the first start of the application if there are no Google accounts registered on the phone. This function uses the addAccount(String accountType, String authTokenType, String[] requiredFeatures, Bundle addAccountOptions, Activity activity, AccountManagerCallback callback, Handler handler) method of the AccountManager class. The creation is done in a thread launched by the system and needs a callback to return its results. Calling this function results in popping an activity handled by Android. This activity is dedicated in the creation of a Google account.

getTokenInfos

public java.lang.String[] getTokenInfos()
Function used to get token infos

Returns:
An array of string containing, respectively, the token and its type

gotAccount

private void gotAccount(Account account)
Function used to get a token for a specified account. This function is called each time a new token is needed by the application. This function uses getAuthToken(Account account, String authTokenType, boolean notifyAuthFailure, AccountManagerCallback callback, Handler handler) from the AccountManager class. As the function needs to be launched in a thread, one is created before its use. Then a callback is used to obtain the token.

Parameters:
account - The account for which we need to obtain a token
